These barriers count as blocking terrain and last until the end of the encounter or until they are destroyed. Each Barrier segment is 2 meters tall, 1 meter wide, and 2 centimeters thick. Each segment has 20 Hit Points, 15 Damage Reduction, and takes damage as if it was Psychic Typed.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.418"}}

Guard Swap.embed: {"title":"Guard Swap","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute - Inversed Appeal"}],"description":"The user and the target trade Combat Stage values for the Defense Stat, and then for the Special Defense Stat.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.419"}}

Imprison.embed: {"title":"Imprison","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"10, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart -  Good Show!"}],"description":"The target is Locked for the rest of the Scene. A Locked target may not use any Moves the user knows. Imprison cannot miss.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.420"}}

Kinesis.embed: {"title":"Kinesis","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target, Trigger, Interrupt"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Get Ready!"}],"description":"If the user or an Ally within 6 meters is about to be hit by an attack, the user may use Kinesis as an interrupt. The triggering Accuracy Roll receives a -4 penalty. This may cause Moves to miss.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.421"}}

Magic Coat.embed: {"title":"Magic Coat","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily"},{"name":"Range","value":"4, Interrupt, Trigger"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Double Time"}],"description":"If the user is about to get a hit by a Move that does not have a Damage Dice Roll, they may use Magic Coat as an Interrupt. The Interrupted Move\u2019s user is treated as if they were the target of their own Move, with the user of Magic Coat as the user.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.421"}}

Luster Purge.embed: {"title":"Luster Purge","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"DB","value":7},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"8, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Seen Nothing Yet"}],"description":"Luster Purge lowers the target's Special Defense by -1 CS on an Even-Numbered Roll.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.421"}}

Magic Room.embed: {"title":"Magic Room","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"Field"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute - Tease"}],"description":"The area becomes Useless for 5 rounds. While Useless, Pok\u00e9mon may not benefit from the effects of any Held Items, and Trainers cannot benefit from any Accessory-Slot equipment. This does not affect consumable or activated items, only Items with Static effects or Triggers.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.421"}}

Miracle Eye.embed: {"title":"Miracle Eye","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self, Swift Action"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute -  Good Show!"}],"description":"Miracle Eye may be activated as a Swift Action on the user\u2019s turn. For the rest of the turn, the user\u2019s Psychic-Type Moves can hit and affect Dark-Type targets, and the user can see through the Illusion Ability, Moves with the Illusion keyword, and effects created by the Illusionist Capability, ignoring all effects from those.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.422"}}

Heal Pulse.embed: {"title":"Heal Pulse","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target, Aura"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Reflective Appeal"}],"description":"Restores 50% of the target\u2019s max Hit Points. Heal Pulse\u2019s user may not target itself with Heal Pulse.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.420"}}

Psybeam.embed: {"title":"Psybeam","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"DB","value":7},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Exhausting Act"}],"description":"Psybeam Confuses the target on 19+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.422"}}

Psychic.embed: {"title":"Psychic","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"DB","value":9},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"5, 1 Target, Push"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Exhausting Act"}],"description":"The target is Pushed 1 meter in any direction. Psystrike.embed: {"title":"Psystrike","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"DB","value":10},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"4, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Incentives"}],"description":" When calculating damage, the target subtracts their Defense from Psystrike's damage instead of their Special Defense. Psystrike is still otherwise Special (Special Evasion is used to avoid it, Mirror Coat can reflect it, etc.)","footer":{"text":"Core: p.423"}}

Psywave.embed: {"title":"Psywave","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"DB","value":"See Effect"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"AC","value":5},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Steady Performance"}],"description":"Roll 1d4; on 1 the target loses HP equal to half the user's Level; on 2 the target loses HP equal to the user's Level; on 3 the target loses HP equal to 1.5x the user's level; on 4 the target loses HP equal to the user's Level doubled. Do not apply weakness or resistance, and do not apply Stats. Do apply Immunity.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.423"}}

Reflect.embed: {"title":"Reflect","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Blessing"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Excitement"}],"description":"Blessing \u2013 Any user affected by Reflect may activate it when receiving Physical Damage to resist the Damage one step. Reflect may be activated 2 times, and then disappears.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.424"}}

Role Play.embed: {"title":"Role Play","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute -  Catching Up"}],"description":"The user gains one of the target's Abilities, chosen at random, for the remainder of the encounter. Skill Swap.embed: {"title":"Skill Swap","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Excitement"}],"description":"The user loses one of their Abilities, selected by the user, and gains one the target\u2019s Abilities, selected at random, for the remainder of encounter. Stored Power.embed: {"title":"Stored Power","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"DB","value":2},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"10, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Incentives"}],"description":"For every Combat Stage the user has above 0, add +2 to Stored Power\u2019s Damage Base, up to a maximum of Damage Base 20.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.424"}}

Cheap Shot.embed: {"title":"Cheap Shot","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":5},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"}],"description":"Cheap Shot cannot miss.\nLimitation: Small Melee and Short Ranged Weapons Only","footer":{"text":"Core: p.288"}}

Double Swipe.embed: {"title":"Double Swipe","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":4},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, 2 Targets; or WR, 1 Target, Double Strike"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"}],"description":"","footer":{"text":"Core: p.288"}}

Bide.embed: {"title":"Bide","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"DB","value":"See Effect"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 1, Friendly"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Double TIme"}],"description":"The user may use Bide as a Reaction Move upon being Hit by a Damaging Move. During their next available turn, the user may Shift and then use Bide, causing all Adjacent foes to lose X HP, where X is the amount of Damage taken since declaring use of Bide (Loss of life through effects such as Poison is not \u2018Damage\u2019).","footer":{"text":"Core: p.392"}}

Blaze Kick.embed: {"title":"Blaze Kick","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fire"},{"name":"DB","value":9},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":4},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Exhausting Act"}],"description":"Blaze Kick Burns the target on 19+ and is a Critical Hit on 18+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.369"}}

Bone Club.embed: {"title":"Bone Club","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Ground"},{"name":"DB","value":7},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":5},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Steady Performance"}],"description":"Bone Club Flinches the target on 18+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.385"}}

Bane.embed: {"title":"Bane","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":4},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"}],"description":"The target loses a Tick of Hit Points at the start of their next three turns and suffers a -2 penalty to all Save Checks on those turns.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.45"}}

Energy Blast.embed: {"title":"Energy Blast","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":4},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":3},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, Blast 2"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"}],"description":"You gain +1 Special Attack on 19+.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.44"}}

Energy Vortex.embed: {"title":"Energy Vortex","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":2},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":4},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"}],"description":"The target is put in a Vortex.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.45"}}

Magic Burst.embed: {"title":"Magic Burst","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":6},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 1, Friendly"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"}],"description":"Foes hit by Magic Burst can\u2019t make Attacks of Opportunity for 1 full round.\nLimitation: Melee Weapons Only","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.45"}}

Spirit Lance.embed: {"title":"Spirit Lance","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":6},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Line 6"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"}],"description":"Spirit Lance deals +3 damage to all targets for each target beyond the first that it successfully hits.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.45"}}

Bash!.embed: {"title":"Bash!","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":7},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"}],"description":"Bash! lowers the target\u2019s Initiative to 0 for 1 full round on 15+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.288"}}

Arcane Storm.embed: {"title":"Arcane Storm","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":6},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, Blast 3"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"}],"description":"All targets of Arcane Storm are Slowed and Vulnerable for 1 Full Round.\nLimitation: Ranged Weapons only","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.45"}}

Energy Sphere.embed: {"title":"Energy Sphere","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":4},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":3},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 1"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"}],"description":"You gain +1 Special Defense Combat Stage on 19+.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.44"}}

Deadly Strike.embed: {"title":"Deadly Strike","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":6},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"}],"description":"If Deadly Strike Hits, it is a Critical Hit.\nLimitation: Not usable by Large Melee Weapons.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.290"}}

Furious Strikes.embed: {"title":"Furious Strikes","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":3},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, 1 Target, Five Strike"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"}],"description":"For each hit rolled on your Five Strike roll, the target of the attack has their Evasion reduced by 1 for one full round.\nLimitation: Melee or Short Ranged Weapons Only","footer":{"text":"Core: p.290"}}

Gouge.embed: {"title":"Gouge","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":5},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, 1 Target, Double Strike"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"}],"description":"If both hits of Gouge successfully hit the target, the target gains an Injury.\nLimitation: Small Melee and Short Ranged Weapons Only","footer":{"text":"Core: p.290"}}

Maul.embed: {"title":"Maul","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":5},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"1 Target, Melee"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"}],"description":"The target is Flinched.\nLimitation: Melee Weapons Only","footer":{"text":"Core: p.290"}}

Riposte.embed: {"title":"Riposte","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":12},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, 1 Target, Reaction, Trigger"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"}],"description":"Trigger: Your Target misses you with a melee Attack.\nLimitations: Melee or Short-Ranged Weapons Only","footer":{"text":"Core: p.290"}}

Titanic Slam.embed: {"title":"Titanic Slam","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":11},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":3},{"name":"Range","value":"1 Target, Melee"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"}],"description":"On Even-Numbered Rolls, the target is Slowed for one full round.\nLimitation: Melee Weapons Only","footer":{"text":"Core: p.291"}}

Triple Threat.embed: {"title":"Triple Threat","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":7},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, 3 Targets"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"}],"description":"Limitation: Large Melee Weapons and Long-Range Weapons Only","footer":{"text":"Core: p.291"}}

Wear Down.embed: {"title":"Wear Down","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":5},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"}],"description":"Wear Down lowers the target\u2019s Defense by 1 Combat Stage on Even-Numbered Rolls.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.289"}}

Wounding Strike.embed: {"title":"Wounding Strike","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":6},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"}],"description":"The target loses a Tick of Hit Points.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.289"}}

Charge Beam.embed: {"title":"Charge Beam","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Electric"},{"name":"DB","value":5},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":4},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Exhausting Act"}],"description":"If Charge Beam successfully hits a target, roll 1d20. On a roll of 7+, the user's Special Attack is raised by +1 Combat Stage.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.356"}}

Pursuit.embed: {"title":"Pursuit","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Dark"},{"name":"DB","value":4},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart -  Good Show!"}],"description":"If the foe is fleeing or being switched out, Pursuit may be used as an Interrupt, targeting the triggering foe. When used as an Interrupt, Pursuit grants the user a +5 bonus to all Movement Speeds, and has a Damage Base of 8 (2d8+10\/19).","footer":{"text":"Core: p.352"}}

Bleed!.embed: {"title":"Bleed!","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":9},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"}],"description":"The target loses a Tick of Hit Points at the start of their next three turns.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.290"}}

Twineedle.embed: {"title":"Twineedle","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Bug"},{"name":"DB","value":3},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":3},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Doublestrike"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Reliable"}],"description":"Twineedle Poisons the target on 18+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.349"}}

Thunder.embed: {"title":"Thunder","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Electric"},{"name":"DB","value":11},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":7},{"name":"Range","value":"12, 1 Target, Smite"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Exhausting Act"}],"description":"Thunder Paralyzes the target on 15+. If the target is in Sunny Weather, Thunder's Accuracy Check is 11. If the target is in Rainy Weather, Thunder cannot miss. If the target is airborne as a result of Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, Thunder cannot miss.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.358"}}

U-Turn.embed: {"title":"U-Turn","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Bug"},{"name":"DB","value":7},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Dash"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute - Inversed Appeal"}],"description":"The user deals damage and then is immediately recalled to its Pok\u00e9 Ball in the same turn. A New Pok\u00e9mon may immediately be sent out. Using U-Turn lets a Trapped user be recalled.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.349"}}

Brine.embed: {"title":"Brine","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Water"},{"name":"DB","value":7},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"6,  1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Incentives"}],"description":"If the target\u2019s Hit Points are under 50%, Brine\u2019s Damage Base is increased to Damage Base 13 (4d10+10 \/ 35).","footer":{"text":"Core: p.432"}}

Fire Spin.embed: {"title":"Fire Spin","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fire"},{"name":"DB","value":4},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":4},{"name":"Range","value":"3, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Safe Option"}],"description":"The target is put in a Vortex. *Grants: Firestarter","footer":{"text":"Core: p.370"}}

Foul Play.embed: {"title":"Foul Play","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Dark"},{"name":"DB","value":10},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Steady Performance"}],"description":"The target reveals its Attack stat. When calculating damage, add the target's Attack stat instead of the user's Attack stat.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.351"}}

Fusion Flare.embed: {"title":"Fusion Flare","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fire"},{"name":"DB","value":10},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"8, 1 Target, Smite"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Seen Nothing Yet"}],"description":"If Fusion Bolt was used this round or last round by any participant of the encounter, Fusion Flare has its Damage Base increased by +3.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.371"}}

Spikes.embed: {"title":"Spikes","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Ground"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"Range","value":"6, Hazard"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Sabotage"}],"description":"Set 8 square meters of Spikes within the range such that all 8 meters are adjacent with at least one other space of Spikes. Spikes cause terrain to count as Slow Terrain, and a grounded foe that runs into the hazards will lose 1\/10th of their full HP and become Slowed until the end of their next turn.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.387"}}

Rock Smash.embed: {"title":"Rock Smash","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fighting"},{"name":"DB","value":4},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Desperation"}],"description":"Rock Smash lowers the target\u2019s Defense 1 Combat Stage on 17+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.367"}}

Acupressure.embed: {"title":"Acupressure","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target or Self"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Get Ready!"}],"description":"Roll 1d6. On a result of 1, raise the target\u2019s Attack by +2 CS. On a result of 2, raise the target\u2019s Defense by +2 CS. On a result of 3, raise the target\u2019s Special Attack by +2 CS. On a result of 4, raise the target\u2019s Special Defense by +2 CS. On a result of 5, raise the target\u2019s Speed by +2 CS. On a result of 6, raise the target\u2019s Accuracy by +2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.391"}}

Giga Drain.embed: {"title":"Giga Drain","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Grass"},{"name":"DB","value":8},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart -  Good Show!"}],"description":"After the target takes damage, the user gains HP equal to half of the damage they dealt to the target.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.381"}}

Embargo.embed: {"title":"Embargo","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Dark"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute - Sabotage"}],"description":"The target cannot use or benefit from held items for the remainder of the encounter. Embargo may only affect one target at a time; if Embargo is used on a new target, the previous target is freed from the effect.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.350"}}

Grudge.embed: {"title":"Grudge","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Ghost"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily"},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target, Interrupt"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Unsettling"}],"description":"You may use Grudge as an Interrupt when a Damaging Attack causes the user to faint. Grudge is activated as a Free Action (does not take up a Command.) The attack is resolved as usual, and the user Faints. The attacker that caused the user to Faint becomes Suppressed for the remainder of the encounter; switching and Taking a Breather does not end Suppression when used this way.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.377"}}

Secret Sword.embed: {"title":"Secret Sword","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fighting"},{"name":"DB","value":8},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Steady Performance"}],"description":"When calculating damage, the target subtracts their Defense from Secret Sword's damage instead of their Special Defense. Psyshock is still otherwise Special (Special Evasion is used to avoid it, Mirror Coat can reflect it, etc.)","footer":{"text":"Core: p.367"}}

Fly.embed: {"title":"Fly","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Flying"},{"name":"DB","value":8},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":3},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, Dash, Set-Up"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart -  Special Attention"}],"description":"Set-Up Effect: The user is moved up 25 meters into the air. Resolution Effect: The user may shift twice while in the air, using their overland or sky speed, and then comes down next to a legal target, and attacks with Fly. *Grants: Sky +3","footer":{"text":"Core: p.374"}}

Crush Claw.embed: {"title":"Crush Claw","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"DB","value":7},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":3},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Dash"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Steady Performance"}],"description":"Crush Claw lowers the target\u2019s Defense by -1 CS on Even-Numbered Rolls.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.394"}}

Flail.embed: {"title":"Flail","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"DB","value":7},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute - Double Time"}],"description":"For each Injury the user has, Flail's Damage Base is increased by +1.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.397"}}

Foresight.embed: {"title":"Foresight","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self, Swift Action"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart -  Good Show!"}],"description":"Foresight may be activated as a Swift Action on the user\u2019s turn. For the rest of the turn, the user\u2019s Normal-Type and Fighting-Type Moves can hit and affect Ghost-Type targets, and the user can see through the Illusion Ability, Moves with the Illusion keyword, and effects created by the Illusionist Capability, ignoring all effects from those.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.397"}}

Hyper Fang.embed: {"title":"Hyper Fang","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"DB","value":8},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":4},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Desperation"}],"description":"Hyper Fang Flinches the target on 19+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.400"}}

Metronome.embed: {"title":"Metronome","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute - Tease"}],"description":"Metronome randomly uses any other Move except for After You, Assist, Bestow, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Crafty Shield, Destiny Bond, Detect, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, King\u2019s Shield, Metronome, Me First, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Protect, Quash, Quick Guard, Rage Powder, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Snore, Spiky Shield, Switcheroo, Thief, Transform, Trick, and Wide Guard. The GM helps to pick the random Move.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.401"}}

Night Daze.embed: {"title":"Night Daze","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Dark"},{"name":"DB","value":9},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":3},{"name":"Range","value":"4, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Unsettling"}],"description":"Night Daze lowers the target's Accuracy by -1 on 13+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.352"}}

Pain Split.embed: {"title":"Pain Split","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"4, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Unsettling"}],"description":"The user and the target both lose 1\/2 of their current Hit Points. Add the amount of Hit Points the user and the target lost together, and divide the value by 2. Both the target and the user gain Hit Points equal to this value. Do not add Injuries from Pain Split from Hit Point Markers until the full effect of the Move has been resolved. Pain Split never causes Massive Damage. Hit Point loss from Pain Split cannot be prevented in any way.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.403"}}

Parting Shot.embed: {"title":"Parting Shot","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Dark"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target, Social"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Catching Up"}],"description":"If Parting Shot successfully hits, the target's Attack and Special Attack stats are lowered by one CS and the user is immediately recalled in the same turn. A new Pokemon may immediately be sent out. using Parting Shot lets a Trapped user be recalled.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.352"}}

Poison Fang.embed: {"title":"Poison Fang","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Poison"},{"name":"DB","value":5},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Incentives"}],"description":"Poison Fang Badly Poisons the target on 17+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.415"}}

Assurance.embed: {"title":"Assurance","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Dark"},{"name":"DB","value":6},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Double Time"}],"description":"If Assurance\u2019s target has already been damaged by a Move on the same round Assurance is being used, Assurance has a Damage Base of 12 (3d12+10 \/ 30) instead. This effect may trigger only once per Scene per Target.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.350"}}

Soft-Boiled.embed: {"title":"Soft-Boiled","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Reflective Appeal"}],"description":"The target regains Hit Points equal to half of its full Hit Points. The user may target themselves with Soft-Boiled.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.408"}}

Transform.embed: {"title":"Transform","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"Range","value":"10, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart -  Catching Up"}],"description":"The user targets a Pok\u00e9mon within 10 meters and assumes the form of the target. It gains all of the target's Moves, Abilities, and Capabilities; and copies its weight and height. Transform lasts until the user is switched out, Fainted, or until the end of the encounter. The user may choose to end the Transformation on its turn as a free action, regaining its previous Move List. The user's Stats do not change from using Transform. Transform cannot miss.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.412"}}

Bug Bite.embed: {"title":"Bug Bite","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Bug"},{"name":"DB","value":6},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Attention Grabber"}],"description":"If the target has a stored Digestion\/Food Buff or has traded in a Digestion\/Food Buff this Scene, the user may gain the effects of the Digestion\/Food Buff. This does no count towards the Usual limit on the user's Digestion\/Food Buffs.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.346"}}

Camouflage.embed: {"title":"Camouflage","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Sabotage"}],"description":"The user changes their Type to match the field. Forests and grassy areas change the user into a Grass Type. Watery areas change the user into a Water Type. Caves and Mountains could change the user into a Rock or Ground Type. An icy terrain would turn the user into an Ice Type. A building may change the user into a Steel or Normal Type. Weather affects what Type the user becomes. Use common sense; if you are having difficult determining what Type the user should become, consult the GM. *Grants Blender","footer":{"text":"Core: p.392"}}

Counter.embed: {"title":"Counter","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fighting"},{"name":"DB","value":"See Effect"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Reaction, Trigger"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Double TIme"}],"description":"Counter may be used as a Reaction when the user is hit by a damaging Physical Attack. Resolve the Triggering Attack, with Counter's user resisting the attack one step further. After the attack is resolved, if Counter's user was not Fainted, the triggering foe then loses Hit Points equal to twice the amount of Hit Points lost by the user from the triggering attack. Note that Counter is Physical, and while it cannot miss, it cannot hit targets immune to Fighting-Type Moves.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.363"}}

Doom Desire.embed: {"title":"Doom Desire","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Steel"},{"name":"DB","value":14},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"10, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Exhausting Act"}],"description":"Doom Desire does nothing on the turn it is used. At the end of the user's next turn, Doom Desire hits, even if the user if no longer on the field. Doom Desire cannot miss.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.429"}}

Gravity.embed: {"title":"Gravity","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"Field"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Sabotage"}],"description":"For 5 rounds, the area is considered Warped. While Warped, Moves that involve the user being airborne may not be used. Pok\u00e9mon cannot use Sky or Levitate Capabilities to end their turn at an altitude higher than 1 meter. Flying-Types and Pok\u00e9mon with the Ability Levitate are no longer immune to Ground-Type Moves. All Accuracy Rolls receive a +2 Bonus.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.419"}}

Gyro Ball.embed: {"title":"Gyro Ball","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Steel"},{"name":"DB","value":6},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Double Time"}],"description":"The target reveals their Speed Stat (including Combat Stages). If it is higher than the user\u2019s (including Combat Stages), subtract the user\u2019s Speed Stat from the target\u2019s and apply the difference as Bonus Damage.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.429"}}

Mirror Coat.embed: {"title":"Mirror Coat","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Any, 1 Target, Reaction"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Double Time"}],"description":"Mirror Coat may be used as a Reaction when the user is hit by a damaging Special Attack. Resolve the Triggering Attack, with Mirror Coat\u2019s user resisting the attack one step further. After the attack is resolved, if Mirror Coat\u2019s user was not Fainted, the triggering foe then loses Hit Points equal to twice the amount of Hit Points lost by the user from the triggering attack. Note that Mirror Coat is Special, and while it cannot miss, it cannot hit targets immune to Psychic-Type Moves.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.422"}}

Teleport.embed: {"title":"Teleport","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self, Interrupt"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Saving Grace"}],"description":"The user Teleports up to X meters, where X is its Teleporter Capability. Any Move that targeted Teleport's user continue through the desired target's space if the Move allows for it as if the user hadn't been there; single target moves simply miss. *Grants Teleporter 4","footer":{"text":"Core: p.425"}}

Rending Spell.embed: {"title":"Rending Spell","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":3},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"}],"description":"The target loses a Tick of Hit Points on 16+.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.44"}}

Dive (Move).embed: {"title":"Dive","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Water"},{"name":"DB","value":8},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 1, Set Up, Full Action"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty -  Special Attention"}],"description":"Set-Up Effect: The user moves underwater and its turn ends. The user must be in water at least 10 meters deep to use Dive. While underwater, the user may not be targeted by Moves. Resolution Effect: The user may shift horizontally using their underwater speed, and then may shift straight up until reaching a target. The user then attacks with Dive, creating a Burst 1. *Grants Swim +3","footer":{"text":"Core: p.433"}}

Take Aim.embed: {"title":"Take Aim","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"}],"description":"Raise the user\u2019s Accuracy by +1. If the user performs an Weapon Move on their next turn that deals damage, add its Damage Dice Roll an extra time to the damage.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.289"}}

Clamp.embed: {"title":"Clamp","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Water"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Range","value":"--"},{"name":"Category","value":"Static"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Steady Performance"}],"description":"The user gains a +1 Bonus to Accuracy Rolls made to initiate Grapple Maneuvers, and +2 to Skill Checks made to initiate Grapple Maneuvers or gain Dominance. Whenever the user gains Dominance in a Grapple, the target of the Grapple loses a Tick of Hit Points.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.432"}}

Topsy-Turvy.embed: {"title":"Topsy-Turvy","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Dark"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":4},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Unsettling"}],"description":"The target\u2019s Combat Stages are inverted; +1 Stage becomes -1 Stage, -3 Stages becomes +3 Stages, etc.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.353"}}

Secret Force.embed: {"title":"Secret Force","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":4},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":4},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Smite"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"}],"description":"When calculating damage, the target subtracts their Defense from Secret Force\u2019s damage instead of their Special Defense. Secret Force is still otherwise Special.\nLimitation: Melee Weapons Only","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.45"}}

Substitute.embed: {"title":"Substitute","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self, Illusion, Coat"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart -  Catching Up"}],"description":"The user loses 1\/4 of their maximum Hit Points. This Hit Point loss cannot be prevented in any way. The user creates an Illusory Substitute Coat, which has Hit Points equal to 1\/4th of the user\u2019s full Hit Points +1. If the user would be hit by a Move or attack, instead the Substitute gets hit. Apply weakness, resistance and stats to the Substitute. The Substitute is immune to Status Afflictions and Status Moves. Moves with the Social or Sonic keywords completely ignore and bypass the Substitute. Once the Substitute has been destroyed, the user may be hit as normal. Substitute cannot be used if the user has less than 1\/4 of their full Hit Points.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.410"}}

Hold Hands.embed: {"title":"Hold Hands","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"? - ?"}],"description":"Both the user and the target become Cheered. They may give up the Cheered condition when making a Save Check to roll twice and take the best result.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.399"}}

Toxic Spikes.embed: {"title":"Toxic Spikes","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Poison"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"Range","value":"6, Hazard"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Sabotage"}],"description":"Set 8 square meters of Toxic Spikes within the range such that all 8 meters are adjacent with at least one other space of Toxic Spikes. Toxic Spikes cause Terrain to become Slow Terrain, and a grounded foe that runs into the hazard becomes Poisoned and Slowed until the end of their next turn. If there are 2 layers of Toxic Spikes on the same space, it Badly Poisons the foes instead. Poison-Type Pokemon may move over Toxic Spikes harmlessly, destroying the Hazards as they do so.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.416"}}

Close Combat.embed: {"title":"Close Combat","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fighting"},{"name":"DB","value":12},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Dash"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Seen Nothing Yet"}],"description":"Lower the user\u2019s Defense and Special Defense by -1 CS each after damage.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.363"}}

Copycat.embed: {"title":"Copycat","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"4, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Attention Grabber"}],"description":"Use the Move the target has used on their last turn. You may choose new targets for the Move. Copycat cannot miss.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.393"}}

Fury Cutter.embed: {"title":"Fury Cutter","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Bug"},{"name":"DB","value":4},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":3},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Reliable"}],"description":"If Fury Cutter is used successfully and consecutively on the same target, the Damage Base is increased by +4; the first hit has a DB of 4; the second hit a DB of 8, the third hit a DB of 12, and the fourth and all further hits have a DB of 16. If Fury Cutter misses or fails to damage its target, its Damage Base resets.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.346"}}

Powder (Move).embed: {"title":"Powder","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Bug"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target, Interrupt, Powder"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Sabotage"}],"description":"The target is dusted with a Coat of flammable powder. If the affected target uses a damaging Fire-Type attack, the attack is negated and instead creates a Blast 3 centered on itself as the powder explodes, and the Coat is removed. All legal targets within the Blast take damage equal to what the user of the Fire-Type attack would roll for the damage of their attack. This damage is Typeless or Fire-Type, whichever would be more effective.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.347"}}

Bulk Up.embed: {"title":"Bulk Up","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fighting"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Get Ready!"}],"description":"Raise the user\u2019s Attack and Defense by +1 CS each.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.363"}}

Dragon Dance.embed: {"title":"Dragon Dance","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Dragon"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Get Ready!"}],"description":"Raise the user\u2019s Attack and Speed by +1 CS.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.354"}}

Electric Terrain.embed: {"title":"Electric Terrain","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Electric"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"Field"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Sabotage"}],"description":"The field becomes Electrified for 5 rounds. While the field is Electrified, Pokemon and Trainers touching the ground are immune to Sleep, and Electric-Type attacks used by Pokemon and Trainers touching the ground gain a +10 Bonus to Damage Rolls.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.356"}}

Flying Press.embed: {"title":"Flying Press","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fighting"},{"name":"DB","value":8},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":3},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, Dash, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Big Show"}],"description":"Flying Press may deal Flying Type damage if the user wishes. NOTE: If Flying Press is Move Sync'd, it only changes the Fighting Type portion of the Move. You can still only choose between that Type and Flying Type; you cannot shift Flying Press to change the Flying part to another Type.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.364"}}

Geomancy.embed: {"title":"Geomancy","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fairy"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self, Set Up"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Catching Up"}],"description":"Set-Up Effect: The user may not shift this round. The user may create as many squares of Rough Terrain as it wants within a Burst 3 as plants burst through the ground, regardless of the surface material. Resolution Effect: Geomancy raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by +2 CS.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.361"}}

Jump Kick.embed: {"title":"Jump Kick","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fighting"},{"name":"DB","value":10},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":3},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, Dash, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Steady Performance"}],"description":"If Jump Kick misses, the user loses Hit Points equal to 1\/4th of their Max Hit Points. A failure to hit due to a Move with the Shield keyword does not count as a miss. This cannot be used if Gravity is in effect.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.365"}}

Outrage.embed: {"title":"Outrage","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Dragon"},{"name":"DB","value":12},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":3},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, All Adjacent Foes, Smite"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Reliable"}],"description":"Outrage makes the user becomes Enraged and Confused after damage is dealt.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.355"}}

Parabolic Charge.embed: {"title":"Parabolic Charge","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Electric"},{"name":"DB","value":5},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"AC","value":4},{"name":"Range","value":"Cone 2"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Desperation"}],"description":"The user gains HP equal to half of the total damage the user dealt to all legal targets.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.358"}}

Revenge.embed: {"title":"Revenge","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fighting"},{"name":"DB","value":6},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Double TIme"}],"description":"When declaring Revenge, the user does nothing and may not Shift. At the end of the round, the user may Shift and use Revenge. If the target damaged the user this round, Revenge has a Damage Base of 12 (4d10+15 \/ 40).","footer":{"text":"Core: p.366"}}

Sucker Punch.embed: {"title":"Sucker Punch","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Dark"},{"name":"DB","value":8},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Trigger, Interrupt"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Saving Grace"}],"description":"If an adjacent foe targets the user with a Damaging Attack, Sucker Punch may be used as an Interrupt Move against the triggering foe.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.353"}}

Thunder Fang.embed: {"title":"Thunder Fang","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Electric"},{"name":"DB","value":7},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":3},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Steady Performance"}],"description":"Thunder Fang Paralyzes or Flinches on 18-19; flip a coin to determine whether the foe becomes Paralyzed or Flinched. On 20, the foe is both Paralyzed and Flinched.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.358"}}

Volt Switch.embed: {"title":"Volt Switch","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Electric"},{"name":"DB","value":7},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"5, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute - Inversed Appeal"}],"description":"If Volt Switch successfully hits its target, the user deals damage and then immediately is returned to its Poke Ball in the same turn. A New Pokemon may immediately be sent out. Using Volt Switch lets a Trapped user be recalled","footer":{"text":"Core: p.359"}}

Bounce.embed: {"title":"Bounce","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Flying"},{"name":"DB","value":9},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":4},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Dash, Full Action"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute -  Special Attention"}],"description":"The user first Shifts, gaining a +1 Bonus to Movement Speed and to their Jump Capabilities. After the user Shifts, they may attack with Bounce. The target becomes Vulnerable, and is Paralyzed on 16+. Grants High Jump +1","footer":{"text":"Core: p.373"}}

Drain Punch.embed: {"title":"Drain Punch","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fighting"},{"name":"DB","value":8},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Aura"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty -  Good Show!"}],"description":"After the target takes damage, the user gains HP equal to half of the damage it dealt to the target.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.364"}}

Fiery Dance.embed: {"title":"Fiery Dance","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fire"},{"name":"DB","value":8},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"4, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Desperation"}],"description":"If Fiery Dance successfully hits a foe, it raises the user's Special Attack by 1 Combat Stage on Even-Numbered Rolls.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.369"}}

Fire Pledge.embed: {"title":"Fire Pledge","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fire"},{"name":"DB","value":8},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target, Pledge"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Safe Option"}],"description":"If an ally uses Grass Pledge or Water Pledge, you may use Fire Pledge as Priority (Advanced) immediately after their turn to target the same foe. If used in conjunction with Grass Pledge, Fire Hazards are created in a Brust 1 around the target. If used in conjucntion with Water Pledge, a Rainbow is created that lasts for 5 rouns. Counsult the Pledge keyword for additional details.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.370"}}

Flare Blitz.embed: {"title":"Flare Blitz","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fire"},{"name":"DB","value":12},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Dash, Recoil 1\/3"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Seen Nothing Yet"}],"description":"Flare Blitz Burns the target on 19+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.371"}}

Incinerate.embed: {"title":"Incinerate","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fire"},{"name":"DB","value":6},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Line 3"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Steady Performance"}],"description":"If a target is holding a Held Item or Main or Off-Hand item, they must either drop it immediately or lose a Tick of Hit Points. This may only cause a target to lose at most one Tick of Hit Points, no matter how many items they were holding","footer":{"text":"Core: p.371"}}

Mat Block.embed: {"title":"Mat Block","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fighting"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self, Trigger, Interrupt, Shield"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Reflective Appeal"}],"description":"If the user or an adjacent ally is hit by a damagin attack, the user may use Mat Block. The attack instead does not hit any targets, and it deals no damage and has no effects. You may only use Mat Block during the first round of an encounter","footer":{"text":"Core: p.366"}}

Mist.embed: {"title":"Mist","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Ice"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"Blessing"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Sabotage"}],"description":"Any user affected by Mist may activate it when having Combat Stages lowered by any effect; if they do, those Combat Stages are instead not lowered. Mist may be activated 3 times and then disappears.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.390"}}

Overheat.embed: {"title":"Overheat","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fire"},{"name":"DB","value":13},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"AC","value":4},{"name":"Range","value":"8, Ranged Blast 3, Smite"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Seen Nothing Yet"}],"description":"Lower the user's Special Attack 2 Combat Stages after damage.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.372"}}

Sky Attack.embed: {"title":"Sky Attack","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Flying"},{"name":"DB","value":14},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":4},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, Pass, Set-Up, Full Action"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool -  Special Attention"}],"description":"Set-Up Effect: The user is moved up 25 meters into the air. Resolution Effect: The user may shift until they are next to a legal target in the encounter. They may then shift again and pass through legal targets to attack with Sky Attack. Sky Attack Flinches a target on 17+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.375"}}

Sunny Day.embed: {"title":"Sunny Day","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fire"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"Field, Weather"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Sabotage"}],"description":"The weather becomes Sunny for 5 rounds. While Sunny, Fire-Type Attacks gain a +5 bonus to Damage Rolls, and Water-Type Attacks suffer a -5 Damage penalty.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.372"}}

Triple Kick.embed: {"title":"Triple Kick","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fighting"},{"name":"DB","value":"X, See Effect"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":3},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Reliable"}],"description":"Make three attacks with Triple Kick. If you hit once, Triple Kick has a DB of 1. If you hit two times, Triple Kick has a DB of 3. If you hit three times, Triple Kick has a DB of 6.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.368"}}

Blue Flare.embed: {"title":"Blue Flare","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fire"},{"name":"DB","value":13},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":5},{"name":"Range","value":"10, 1 Target, Smite"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Steady Performance"}],"description":"Blue Flare Burns the target on 17+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.369"}}

Hail.embed: {"title":"Hail","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Ice"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"Field, Weather"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Sabotage"}],"description":"The weather changes to Hail for 5 rounds. While it is Hailing, all non-Ice Type Pokemon lose a Tick of Hit Points at the beginning of their turn.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.389"}}

Hex.embed: {"title":"Hex","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Ghost"},{"name":"DB","value":7},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Incentives"}],"description":"Once a Scene, if Hex's target has a Status Affliction, you may have Hex's Damage Base be 13 instead (4d10+10 \/ 35)","footer":{"text":"Core: p.377"}}

Ice Burn.embed: {"title":"Ice Burn","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Ice"},{"name":"DB","value":14},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"AC","value":4},{"name":"Range","value":"10, 1 Target, Set-Up, Full Action"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Seen Nothing Yet"}],"description":"Set-Up Effect: The user may shift, then ends their turn. Resolution Effect: The user attacks with Ice Burn. Ice Burn Burns on 15+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.389"}}

Ingrain.embed: {"title":"Ingrain","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Grass"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self, Coat"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Safe Option"}],"description":"Ingrain applies a Coat to the user, which has the following effect; the user cannot be pushed or pulled, and cannot be switched out. At the beginning of each of the user's turn, the user gains HP equal to 1\/10th of its max HP.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.381"}}

Magnitude.embed: {"title":"Magnitude","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Ground"},{"name":"DB","value":"X, See Effect"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 2, Groundsource"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Desperation"}],"description":"When you use Magnitude, roll 1d6. Magnitude\u2019s Damage Base is equal to 5+X, where X is the value of the d6. Magnitude can hit targets that are underground, including those using the Move Dig. *Grants: Groundshaper","footer":{"text":"Core: p.386"}}

Needle Arm.embed: {"title":"Needle Arm","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Grass"},{"name":"DB","value":6},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Steady Performance"}],"description":"Needle Arm Flinches the target on 15+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.382"}}

Nightmare.embed: {"title":"Nightmare","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Ghost"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Excitement"}],"description":"Nightmare can only hit Legal Targets that are Asleep. The target gains Bad Sleep.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.378"}}

Solar Beam.embed: {"title":"Solar Beam","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Grass"},{"name":"DB","value":12},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Line 6, 1 Target, Set-Up"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool -  Special Attention"}],"description":"Set-Up Effect: If the weather is not Sunny, the user\u2019s turn ends. If the weather is Sunny, immediately proceed to the Resolution Effect instead and this Move loses the Set-Up keyword. Resolution Effect: The user attacks with Solar Beam. If the weather is Rainy, Sandstorming, or Hailing, Solar Beam\u2019s Damage Base is lowered to 6 (2d6+8 \/ 15).","footer":{"text":"Core: p.383"}}

Stun Spore.embed: {"title":"Stun Spore","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Grass"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":6},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target, Powder"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Excitement"}],"description":"The target is Paralyzed.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.384"}}

Energy Ball.embed: {"title":"Energy Ball","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Grass"},{"name":"DB","value":9},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"8, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Exhausting Act"}],"description":"Energy Ball lowers the foe\u2019s Special Defense 1 Combat Stage on 17+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.380"}}

Avalanche.embed: {"title":"Avalanche","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Ice"},{"name":"DB","value":6},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Double TIme"}],"description":"When declaring Avalanche, the user does nothing and may not Shift. At the end of the round, the user may Shift and use Avalanche. If the target damaged the user this round, Avalanche has a Damage Base of 12 (4d10+15 \/ 40).","footer":{"text":"Core: p.388"}}

Encore.embed: {"title":"Encore","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"4, 1 Target, Social"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute -  Good Show!"}],"description":"Roll 1d6. On a result of 1 or 2, the target becomes Confused; on a result of 3 or 4 the target becomes Suppressed; on a result of 5 or 6 the target becomes Enraged.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.395"}}

Feint.embed: {"title":"Feint","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Trigger"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Inversed Appeal"}],"description":"If a foe uses a Move with the Shield Keyword in response to one of your actions, you may activate Feint to cause the triggering Move to Fail. Feint is activated as a Free Action.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.396"}}

Growth.embed: {"title":"Growth","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Get Ready!"}],"description":"Raise the user's Attack and Special Attack by +1 CS each. If it is Sunny, double the amount of Combat Stages gained. *Grants Inflatable","footer":{"text":"Core: p.398"}}

Last Resort.embed: {"title":"Last Resort","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"DB","value":14},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Dash"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute - Safe Option"}],"description":"Last Resort can only be used after the user has performed 5 other different Moves in its Move List during a single fight, without being switched out.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.400"}}

Mind Reader.embed: {"title":"Mind Reader","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart -  Good Show!"}],"description":"The target becomes Read to the user until the end of the user\u2019s next turn. The user may end this effect when making an Attack on the user, causing that attack to automatically hit; OR when the Read target uses an Attack against the user, causing that attack to automatically miss. If the user has the Telepathy Capability, the user automatically succeeds on a mindreading attempt against the target, and may listen to the target\u2019s surface thoughts as long as they remain Read. Mind Reader automatically misses against targets with the Mindlock Capability.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.402"}}

Perish Song.embed: {"title":"Perish Song","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily"},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 15, Sonic"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Unsettling"}],"description":"Perish Song cannot miss. All targets, including the user, receive a Perish Count of 3. At the beginning of each of the target\u2019s turns, their Perish count is lowered by 1. Once a Perish Count reaches 0, set the Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Hit Points to 0. A Perish Count disappears if a target returns to their Pok\u00e9 Ball, Takes a Breather, or is knocked out. Perish Song never causes Massive Damage.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.403"}}

Retaliate.embed: {"title":"Retaliate","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"DB","value":7},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Steady Performance"}],"description":"Retaliate's DB is doubled to DB 14 (4d10+15 \/ 40) if an ally has been Fainted by a Damaging Move used by the Target in the last 2 rounds of Combat.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.405"}}

Self-Destruct.embed: {"title":"Self-Destruct","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"DB","value":20},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 3"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Big Show"}],"description":"The user's HP is set to -50% of its full HP. This HP loss may not be prevented or reduced in any way. The user's loyalty may be lowered.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.407"}}

After You.embed: {"title":"After You","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Desperation"}],"description":"After You is a Swift Action. The target takes their turn for the round immediately after the user finishes their turn, ignoring Initiative. After You may only affect a target that has not yet acted that round and can only affect willing targets.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.391"}}

Future Sight.embed: {"title":"Future Sight","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"DB","value":12},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"10, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Exhausting Act"}],"description":"Future Sight does nothing on the turn it is used. At the end of the user's next turn, Future Sight hits, even if the user is no longer on the field. Future Sight cannot miss.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.419"}}

Poison Tail.embed: {"title":"Poison Tail","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Poison"},{"name":"DB","value":5},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Incentives"}],"description":"Poison Tail is a Critical Hit on 18+ and Poisons the target on 19+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.415"}}

Rock Climb.embed: {"title":"Rock Climb","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"DB","value":8},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":5},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Dash"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Desperation"}],"description":"Rock Climb Confuses the target on 17+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.406"}}

Safeguard.embed: {"title":"Safeguard","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Blessing"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Sabotage"}],"description":"Blessing \u2013 Any user affected by Safeguard may activate it when receiving a Status Affliction to ignore the effects of that Status Affliction on their next turn. Safeguard may be activated 3 times, and then disappears.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.406"}}

Sketch.embed: {"title":"Sketch","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily"},{"name":"Range","value":"15, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart -  Catching Up"}],"description":"Sketch cannot miss. Once Sketch has been used, remove Sketch from the user's Move list. The last Move that the target used is added to the user's Move list permanently. Sketch may not be Interrupted or Intercepted.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.407"}}

Sleep Talk.embed: {"title":"Sleep Talk","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute - Steady Performance"}],"description":"Select another of the user\u2019s Moves at random; this turn, the user may Shift and use that Move despite being Asleep. Sleep Talk can be only be used by Sleeping targets.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.408"}}

Stockpile.embed: {"title":"Stockpile","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Get Ready!"}],"description":"The user adds 1 to their Stockpiled count to a maximum of 3. For each number a Stockpiled count is above 0, raise the user\u2019s Defense and Special Defense by +1 CS each. If a Stockpiled count is set to 0, any Combat Stages gained from the Stockpiled count are removed.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.409"}}

Telekinesis.embed: {"title":"Telekinesis","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"4, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Steady Performance"}],"description":"The target becomes Lifted. While Lifted, they gain the Levitate Ability, are Slowed, and lose all Movement Capabilities except for the Levitate 4 granted by Levitate (reduced to 2 by the Slow condition). While Lifted, the user may not apply any Evasion bonuses to determine whether they are hit by Moves or not. The Lifted target may use a Shift Action to roll 1d20; on a result of 16+, they stop being Lifted. *Grants Telekinetic","footer":{"text":"Core: p.425"}}

Tri Attack.embed: {"title":"Tri Attack","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"DB","value":8},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Steady Performance"}],"description":"Tri Attack gives the target a Status ailment on 17+. If this effect is triggered, roll 1d3; on 1 the target is Paralyzed; on 2 the target is Burned; on 3 the target is Frozen.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.412"}}

Venoshock.embed: {"title":"Venoshock","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Poison"},{"name":"DB","value":7},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Incentives"}],"description":"If the target is Poisoned, Venoshock has a Damage Base of 13 (4d10+10 \/ 35) instead.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.417"}}

Weather Ball.embed: {"title":"Weather Ball","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"DB","value":5},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"8, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Incentives"}],"description":"If it is Sunny, Weather Ball is Fire-Type. If it is Rainy, Weather Ball is Water-Type. If it is Hailing, Weather Ball is Ice-Type. If it is Sandstorming, Weather Ball is Rock-Type. When a weather effect is on the field, Weather Ball has a Damage Base of 10 (3d8+10 \/ 24). If there are multiple Weather Effects on the field, choose one type for Weather Ball to be that corresponds with an existing Weather Effect.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.413"}}

Yawn.embed: {"title":"Yawn","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"2, 1 Target, Social"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute - Excitement"}],"description":"The target falls Asleep at the end of its next turn. Yawn cannot miss.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.413"}}

Ally Switch.embed: {"title":"Ally Switch","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target, Interrupt"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Tease"}],"description":"Ally Switch may be declared during a foe\u2019s turn as an Interrupt. The user chooses one willing ally within 6 meters; the target and the user switch places. If the ally was a target of a Move, the user is now the target; If the user was a target of a Move, the ally is now the target.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.418"}}

Hydro Pump.embed: {"title":"Hydro Pump","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Water"},{"name":"DB","value":11},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":4},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target, Push"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Exhausting Act"}],"description":"The target is pushed away from the user 3 meters.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.433"}}

Metal Burst.embed: {"title":"Metal Burst","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Steel"},{"name":"DB","value":"See Effect"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 1"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Double Time"}],"description":"Metal Burst causes all legal targets in the burst to lose HP equal to the total amount of direct Damage the user has taken since the beginning of this Round. Metal Burst cannot miss.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.430"}}

Mist Ball.embed: {"title":"Mist Ball","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"DB","value":7},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"12, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Seen Nothing Yet"}],"description":"Mist Ball lowers the target\u2019s Special Attack by 1 Combat Stage on an Even-Numbered Roll.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.422"}}

Psycho Shift.embed: {"title":"Psycho Shift","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Inversed Appeal"}],"description":"The user is cured of a Status ailment and the target is given that Status ailment. Psycho Shift cannot miss. Psycho Shift can only be used if the user has a Status ailment and the target does not have the status ailment that is being transferred.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.423"}}

Rest.embed: {"title":"Rest","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute - Reflective Appeal"}],"description":"The user is set to their full Hit Point value. The user is cured of any Status ailments. Then, the user falls Asleep. The user cannot make Sleep Checks at the beginning of their turn. They are cured of the Sleep at the end of their turn in 2 rounds.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.424"}}

Rock Blast.embed: {"title":"Rock Blast","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Rock"},{"name":"DB","value":3},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":5},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target, Five Strike"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Reliable"}],"description":"*Grants Materializer","footer":{"text":"Core: p.426"}}

Rock Tomb.embed: {"title":"Rock Tomb","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Rock"},{"name":"DB","value":6},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":5},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Desperation"}],"description":"Rock Tomb lowers the target's Speed by -1 CS. *Grants Materializer","footer":{"text":"Core: p.427"}}

Steel Wing.embed: {"title":"Steel Wing","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Steel"},{"name":"DB","value":7},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":3},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, Pass, Spirit Surge"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Steady Performance"}],"description":"Steel Wing raises the user's Defense by +1 CS on 15+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.431"}}

Surf.embed: {"title":"Surf","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Water"},{"name":"DB","value":9},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Line 6"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Exhausting Act"}],"description":"As a Shift Action, the user may Move to any open square in Surf \u2019s area of effect without provoking any Attacks of Opportunity.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.434"}}

Trick.embed: {"title":"Trick","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"5, 2 Targets"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Attention Grabber"}],"description":"Both targets must be hit for Trick to succeed.
