The user may target itself or willing allies with Trick; you do not need to roll for Accuracy Check in these cases. Both targets lose their Held Item and gain the other target's Held Item. If a target has no Held Item, they still can gain the other target's Held Item.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.425"}}

Withdraw.embed: {"title":"Withdraw","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Water"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute - Sabotage"}],"description":" The user becomes Withdrawn. While Withdrawn, the user becomes immune to Critical Hits and gain 15 Damage Reduction. However, while Withdrawn, the user cannot Shift, and may only use self-targeting Moves. The user may stop being Withdrawn as a Shift Action.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.435"}}

Heavy Slam.embed: {"title":"Heavy Slam","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Steel"},{"name":"DB","value":4},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Incentives"}],"description":"For each weight class the user is above the target, increase Heavy Slam's Damage Base by +2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.429"}}

Light Screen.embed: {"title":"Light Screen","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Blessing"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Sabotage"}],"description":"Blessing \u2013 Any user affected by Light Screen may activate it when receiving Special Damage to resist the Damage one step. Light Screen may be activated 2 times, and then disappears.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.421"}}

Brave Bird.embed: {"title":"Brave Bird","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Flying"},{"name":"DB","value":12},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Dash, Push, Recoil 1\/3"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute - Desperation"}],"description":"The target is pushed back 2 meters.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.373"}}

Crafty Shield.embed: {"title":"Crafty Shield","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fairy"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 2, Trigger, Interrupt, Shield"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Inversed Appeal"}],"description":"If the user or an Ally within 2 meters of Crafty Shield's user is hit by a Status Move, you may use Crafty Shield as an Interrupt. All targets in Crafty Shield's area-of-effect including the user, are instead not hit by the triggering Move and do not suffer any of its effects.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.360"}}

Destiny Bond.embed: {"title":"Destiny Bond","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Ghost"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 10, Friendly"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Big Show"}],"description":"All enemy targets in the burst become Bound to the user until the end of your next turn. If a Bound target causes the user to Faint through a Damaging Attack, the Bound target immediately faints after their attack is resolved.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.377"}}

Roar.embed: {"title":"Roar","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 1, Sonic, Social"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Excitement"}],"description":"When declaring Roar, the user does nothing. At the end of the round, the user Shifts and uses Roar. Targets hit by Roar immediately Shift away from the user using their highest useable movement capability, towards their Trainer if possible. If the target is an owned Pok\u00e9mon and ends this shift within 6 meters of their Pok\u00e9 Ball, they are immediately recalled to their Pok\u00e9 Ball. If that Trainer sends out a replacement, they do not lose their Command action.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.406"}}

Spiky Shield.embed: {"title":"Spiky Shield","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Grass"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self, Interrupt, Shield, Trigger"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Inversed Appeal"}],"description":"If the user is hit by an attack, the user may use Spiky Shield. The user is instead not hit by the Move. You do not take any damage nor are you affected by any of the Move\u2019s effects. In addition, if the triggering attack was Melee-ranged, the attacker loses Hit Points equal to 1\/10th of their Max Hit Points.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.384"}}

Sticky Web.embed: {"title":"Sticky Web","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Bug"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"Range","value":"6, Hazard"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Sabotage"}],"description":"Set 8 square meters of Sticky Web hazards within your range such that all 8 meters are adjacent with at least one other space of Sticky Web. Sticky Web causes Terrain to become Slow Terrain, and a grounded foe that runs into the hazard has its Speed lowered by -1 CS and becomes Slowed until the end of their next turn. Flying-type Pokemon and Pokemon and Trainers with Levitate are not affected by Sticky Web. Bug-type Pokemon may move over Sticky Web harmlessly, destroying theHazards as they do so. *Grants Threaded","footer":{"text":"Core: p.348"}}

Arcane Fury.embed: {"title":"Arcane Fury","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":3},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":3},{"name":"Range","value":"Cone 2"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"}],"description":"Arcane Fury\u2019s Targets become Vulnerable on 19+.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.44"}}

Cone of Force.embed: {"title":"Cone of Force","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":6},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Cone 2, Push"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"}],"description":"Cone of Force Pushes all targets 2 meters, and lowers their Evasion by -2 for 1 full round..\nLimitation: Melee Weapons Only","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.45"}}

Resonance Beam.embed: {"title":"Resonance Beam","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":4},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":3},{"name":"Range","value":"Line 4"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"}],"description":"All targets have their Special Defense lowered by 1 Combat Stage on 20+. This Effect Range is extended by +1 for each foe targeted by this Move.","footer":{"text":"GoT: p.44"}}

Bullseye.embed: {"title":"Bullseye","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":6},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"}],"description":"Bullseye is a Critical Hit on 16+.\nLimitation: Ranged Weapons Only","footer":{"text":"Core: p.288"}}

Pierce!.embed: {"title":"Pierce!","fields":[{"name":"DB","value":7},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"}],"description":"Pierce deals an additional +10 damage against targets with Damage Reduction.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.289"}}

Attack Order.embed: {"title":"Attack Order","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Bug"},{"name":"DB","value":9},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Incentives"}],"description":"Attack Order is a Critical Hit on 18+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.346"}}

Curse.embed: {"title":"Curse","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Ghost"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"See Text"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Safe Option"}],"description":"If the user is not a Ghost Type, Curse has a Frequency of EOT, and when used the user lowers its Speed by -1 Combat Stage, but raises Attack and Defense by +1 Combat Stage each. If the user is a Ghost Type, Curse has a Frequency of Scene, and when used the user loses 1\/3 of their Max Hit Points and a target Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer within 8 meters of the user becomes Cursed. This Hit Point loss cannot be prevented in any way.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.377"}}

Defense Curl.embed: {"title":"Defense Curl","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute - Sabotage"}],"description":"The user becomes Curled Up. While Curled Up, the user becomes immune to Critical Hits and gains 10 Damage Reduction. However, while Curled Up, the user is Slowed and their Accuracy is lowered by -4. The user may stop being Curled Up as a Swift Action. If the user has Rollout or Ice Ball in their Move List, they do not become Slowed while Curled Up. Furthermore, when using the Moves Rollout or Ice Ball while Curled Up, the user gains a +10 bonus to the damage rolls of those Moves and does not suffer Accuracy Penalties from being Curled Up.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.394"}}

Dig.embed: {"title":"Dig","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Ground"},{"name":"DB","value":8},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 1, Set-Up, Full Action, Groundsource"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart -  Special Attention"}],"description":"Set-Up Effect: The user shifts 25 meters underground and their turn ends. Resolution Effect: The user may shift horizontally using their burrow or overland speed, and then shifts 25 meters straight up. Upon reaching the surface, the user attacks with Dig, creating a Burst 1. *Grants: Burrow +3","footer":{"text":"Core: p.385"}}

Disable.embed: {"title":"Disable","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"1 Target, Trigger"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Excitement"}],"description":"Disable may be used as a Free Action that does not take up a Command whenever the user is hit by a Move. That Move becomes Disabled for the attacker.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.394"}}

Dragon Rage.embed: {"title":"Dragon Rage","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Dragon"},{"name":"DB","value":"15 Damage"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"4, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Steady Performance"}],"description":"Dragon Rage causes the target to lose 15 HP. Dragon Rage is Special and interacts with other moves and effects as such (Special Evasion may be applied to avoid it, Mirror Coat can reflect it, etc.).","footer":{"text":"Core: p.354"}}

Earthquake.embed: {"title":"Earthquake","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Ground"},{"name":"DB","value":10},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 3, Groundsource"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Desperation"}],"description":"Earthquake can hit targets that are underground, including those using the Move Dig. *Grants Groundshaper","footer":{"text":"Core: p.386"}}

Electro Ball.embed: {"title":"Electro Ball","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Electric"},{"name":"DB","value":6},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"10, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Double TIme"}],"description":"When determining the damage dealt by Electro Ball, the user adds its Speed Stat (including CS) in addition to their Special Attack Stat. The target in turn subtracts both its Speed and Special Defense Stats from the damage dealt before applying Type Effectiveness.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.357"}}

Fake Out.embed: {"title":"Fake Out","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"DB","value":4},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Priority"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute - Exhausting Act"}],"description":"You may only use Fake Out with Priority upon joining an encounter; if you do, Fake Out Flinches the target. Switching out resets the requirement of joining an encounter.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.396"}}

Fell Stinger.embed: {"title":"Fell Stinger","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Bug"},{"name":"DB","value":3},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Desperation"}],"description":"If the user successfully knocks out the target with Fell Stinger, raise the user's Attack by +2 CS.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.346"}}

Final Gambit.embed: {"title":"Final Gambit","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fighting"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Big Show"}],"description":"Final Gambit lowers the user to 0 Hit Points and causes them to Faint. Final Gambit then deals 1 point of damage to the target for every Hit Point lost by the user. Final Gambit does not cause items to activate.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.364"}}

Stealth Rock.embed: {"title":"Stealth Rock","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Rock"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Field, Hazard"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Sabotage"}],"description":"Set 4 square meters of Stealth Rock hazards within 6 meters. If a foe moves within 2 meters of a space occupied by Rocks, move at most one Rock to the offender, then destroy the Rock. When that happens, the Stealth Rock causes a foe to lose a Tick of Hit Points. Stealth Rock is considered to be dealing damage; Apply Weakness and Resistance. Do not apply stats. A Pok\u00e9mon who has been hit by a Stealth Rock Hazard cannot get hit by another in the same encounter until it is returned to a Pok\u00e9 Ball and then sent back out. *Grants Materializer","footer":{"text":"Core: p.427"}}

Guard Split.embed: {"title":"Guard Split","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute - Inversed Appeal"}],"description":"The target loses 5 Defense and 5 Special Defense. If they do, the user gains 5 Damage Reduction. These effects last until the end of the Scene.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.419"}}

Heal Block.embed: {"title":"Heal Block","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute - Sabotage"}],"description":"Until the end of the encounter, the target may not gain HP or Temporary HP from any source. This effect ends if the target is switched out or Takes a Breather.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.420"}}

Healing Wish.embed: {"title":"Healing Wish","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily"},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute - Safe Option"}],"description":"The user immediately Faints, lowering its HP to 0. The user takes no Injuries from HP Markers when using Healing Wish. The target is immediately cured of up to 3 injuries, healed to their Maximum Hit Points, and has the Frequency of all Moves restored. Healing Wish may target a Pok\u00e9mon in a Pok\u00e9 Ball. Healing Wish does not restore the Frequency of Healing Wish or Lunar Dance. Injuries healed through Healing Wish count toward the total number of Injuries that can be healed each day, and this healing is limited by the same.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.420"}}

Heat Crash.embed: {"title":"Heat Crash","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fire"},{"name":"DB","value":4},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Dash"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Incentives"}],"description":"For each weight class the user is above the target, increase Heavy Crash's damage base by +2.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.371"}}

High Jump Kick.embed: {"title":"High Jump Kick","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fighting"},{"name":"DB","value":13},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":3},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, Dash, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Steady Performance"}],"description":"If High Jump Kick misses, the user loses Hit Points equal to 1\/4th of their Max Hit Points. A failure to hit due to a Move with the Shield keyword does not count as a miss. This cannot be used if Gravity is in effect.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.365"}}

Hurricane.embed: {"title":"Hurricane","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Flying"},{"name":"DB","value":11},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":7},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 1, Smite"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Exhausting Act"}],"description":"Hurricane Confuses its target on 15+. If the target is in Sunny Weather, Hurricane's Accuracy Check is 11. If the target is in Rainy Weather, Hurricane cannot miss. If the target is airborne as a result of Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, Hurricane cannot miss.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.374"}}

Hyper Voice.embed: {"title":"Hyper Voice","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"DB","value":9},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Close Blast 3, Sonic, Smite"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Steady Performance"}],"description":"All legal targets are pushed back to the squares immediately outside the blast, away from the user.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.400"}}

Ice Fang.embed: {"title":"Ice Fang","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Ice"},{"name":"DB","value":7},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":3},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Steady Performance"}],"description":"Ice Fang Freezes or Flinches on 18-19 during Accuracy Check; flip a coin to determine whether the foe becomes Frozen or Flinched. On 20 during Accuracy Check, the foe is both Frozen and Flinched.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.389"}}

King's Shield.embed: {"title":"King's Shield","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Steel"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":" Self, Interrupt, Shield, Trigger"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Inversed Appeal"}],"description":" If the user is hit by an attack, the user may use King\u2019s Shield. The user is instead not hit by the Move. You do not take any damage nor are you affected by any of the Move\u2019s effects. In addition, if the triggering attack was Melee ranged, the attacker\u2019s Attack is lowered by -2 CS.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.430"}}

Leaf Tornado.embed: {"title":"Leaf Tornado","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Grass"},{"name":"DB","value":7},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":4},{"name":"Range","value":"6, Ranged Blast 3"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty -  Good Show!"}],"description":"Small or Medium targets in the central square of the blast are not hit. On 15+, all legal targets have their Accuracy lowered by -1.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.382"}}

Lunar Dance.embed: {"title":"Lunar Dance","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily"},{"name":"Range","value":8},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Safe Option"}],"description":"The user immediately Faints, lowering its Hit Points to 0. The user takes no Injuries from Hit Point Markers when using Lunar Dance. The target is immediately cured of up to 3 injuries, healed to their Maximum Hit Points, and has the Frequency of all Moves restored. Lunar Dance may target a Pok\u00e9mon in a Pok\u00e9 Ball. Lunar Dance does not restore the Frequency of Healing Wish or Lunar Dance. Injuries healed through Lunar Dance count toward the total number of Injuries that can be healed each day, and this healing is limited by the same.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.421"}}

Memento.embed: {"title":"Memento","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Dark"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"8, 1 Target, Trigger, Free Action"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Big Show"}],"description":"Memento may be used as a Free Action that does not consume a Command action when the user becomes Fainted. Lower each of the target's stats by -2 CS.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.351"}}

Double Team.embed: {"title":"Double Team","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self, Illusion, Coat"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Reliable"}],"description":"The user gains 3 activations of Double Team. The user may either activate Double Team when being targeted by an attack to increase their Evasion by +2 against that attack or when making an attack to increase their Accuracy by +2 for that attack.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.395"}}

Odor Sleuth.embed: {"title":"Odor Sleuth","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self, Swift Action"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart -  Good Show!"}],"description":"Odor Sleuth may be activated as a Swift Action on the user\u2019s turn. For the rest of the turn, the user\u2019s Normal-Type and Fighting-Type Moves can hit and affect Ghost-Type targets, and the user can see through the Illusion Ability, Moves with the Illusion keyword, and effects created by the Illusionist Capability, ignoring all effects from those.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.403"}}

Pay Day.embed: {"title":"Pay Day","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"DB","value":4},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Cone 2"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart -  Catching Up"}],"description":"Pay Day scatters metal coins equal in value to 1d8 times the user's level. If it is a trainer battle, the winner of the battle gets to pick up the coins.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.403"}}

Phantom Force.embed: {"title":"Phantom Force","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Ghost"},{"name":"DB","value":9},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Set-Up"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Seen Nothing Yet"}],"description":"Set-Up Effect: The user is removed from the field, and their turn ends. Resolution Effect: Phantom Force\u2019s user appears adjacent to any legal target on the field, ignoring Movement Capabilities, and then uses Phantom Force\u2019s attack. Phantom Force cannot be avoided by Moves with the Shield Keyword, the Dodge Ability, or similar effects, and Intercepts may not be attempted in response.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.378"}}

Psyshock.embed: {"title":"Psyshock","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"DB","value":8},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"4, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Incentives"}],"description":"When calculating damage, the target subtracts their Defense from Psyshock's damage instead of their Special Defense. Psyshock is still otherwise Special (Special Evasion is used to avoid it, Mirror Coat can reflect it, etc.)","footer":{"text":"Core: p.423"}}

Rage Powder.embed: {"title":"Rage Powder","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Bug"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 1 or Line 6; Powder"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Tease"}],"description":"All legal targets hit by Rage Powder are Enraged. While enraged, they must shift to target the user when using a Move or Attack if the user is within reach. If the user is Fainted or Switched out, all legal targets hit by Rage Powder are no longer Enraged.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.347"}}

Razor Wind.embed: {"title":"Razor Wind","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"DB","value":8},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"10, 3 Targets, Set -Up"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool -  Special Attention"}],"description":"Set-Up Effect: The user may not shift this round. The user whips up a whirlwind around themselves, granting +2 Evasion until the end of their next turn and destroying any Smokescreen or Hazards on any squares it is standing on and in all squares adjacent to it. Resolution Effect: The user attacks with Razor Wind. Razor Wind is a Critical Hit on 18+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.404"}}

Roar of Time.embed: {"title":"Roar of Time","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Dragon"},{"name":"DB","value":15},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2"},{"name":"AC","value":4},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 8, Smite, Exhaust"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Seen Nothing Yet"}],"description":"Roar of Time Slows all legal targets, even if the attack misses.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.355"}}

Rock Slide.embed: {"title":"Rock Slide","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Rock"},{"name":"DB","value":8},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":4},{"name":"Range","value":"6, Ranged Blast 3"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Steady Performance"}],"description":"Rock Slide Flinches all legal targets on 17+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.426"}}

Round.embed: {"title":"Round","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"DB","value":"X, See Effect"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 1, Sonic"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Reliable"}],"description":"Round's Damage Base is equal to 6, plus +2 more for each use of Round by any Trainer or Pok\u00e9mon this round, up to a maximum of DB 12 (3d12+10 \/ 30).","footer":{"text":"Core: p.406"}}

Shadow Force.embed: {"title":"Shadow Force","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Ghost"},{"name":"DB","value":12},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Set-Up"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Seen Nothing Yet"}],"description":"Set-Up Effect: The user is removed from the field, and their turn ends. Resolution Effect: Shadow Force\u2019s user appears adjacent to any legal target on the field, ignoring Movement Capabilities, and then uses Shadow Force\u2019s attack. Shadow Force cannot be avoided by Moves with the Shield Keyword, the Dodge Ability, or similar effects, and Intercepts may not be attempted in response.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.379"}}

Simple Beam.embed: {"title":"Simple Beam","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Steady Performance"}],"description":"You choose one of the target's Abilities. Simple Beam changes that Ability to Simple for the remainder of the encounter.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.407"}}

Sky Drop.embed: {"title":"Sky Drop","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Flying"},{"name":"DB","value":6},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":3},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Set-Up"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart -  Special Attention"}],"description":"Set-Up Effect: Make Sky Drop's Accuracy Check. If the user hits, the user and target are moved 25 meters into the air. The target forfeits their next turn and cannot Shift or take actions until Sky Drop is resolved. Resolution Effect: Shift while in the air and lower both the user and the target heights back to the ground. Then apply Sky Drop's damage. If the target has a Sky or Levitate Speed, Sky Drop fails to deal damage. If the user is Fainted after the Set-Up but before the Resolution, the target falls to the ground and takes damage as if Sky Drop had a Damage Base of 3 (1d6+5\/8) unless they have a Sky or Levitate Speed, in which case they take no damage.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.375"}}

Sky Uppercut.embed: {"title":"Sky Uppercut","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fighting"},{"name":"DB","value":9},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":4},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Interrupt"},{"name":"Category","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Exhausting Act"}],"description":"Sky Uppercut may be used as an Interrupt when against a target initiating Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop. If Sky Uppercut successfully hits its target, the Triggering Move fails (though the target may take their next turn normally.)","footer":{"text":"Core: p.367"}}

Sludge Bomb.embed: {"title":"Sludge Bomb","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Poison"},{"name":"DB","value":9},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"8, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Desperation"}],"description":"Sludge Bomb Poisons the target on 15+.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.416"}}

Sonic Boom.embed: {"title":"Sonic Boom","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"DB","value":"15 Damage"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":6},{"name":"Range","value":"8, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Steady Performance"}],"description":"Sonicboom causes the target to lose 15 HP. Sonicboom is Special and interacts with other moves and effects as such (Special Evasion may be applied to avoid it, Mirror Coat can reflect it, etc.)","footer":{"text":"Core: p.409"}}

Swallow.embed: {"title":"Swallow","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Reflective Appeal"}],"description":"If the user\u2019s Stockpiled count is 1, they are healed 25% of their full Hit Point value; if their Stockpiled count is 2, they are healed half of their full Hit Point value; if their Stockpiled count is 3, they are healed back to full Hit Points. After using Swallow, the user\u2019s Stockpiled count is set to 0. If the user has no Stockpiled count, Swallow does nothing.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.410"}}

Thunder Wave.embed: {"title":"Thunder Wave","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Electric"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Excitement"}],"description":"Thunder Wave cannot miss. Thunder Wave Paralyzes the target. Pok\u00e9mon immune to Electric Attacks are immune to Thunder Wave's effects.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.359"}}

Twister.embed: {"title":"Twister","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Dragon"},{"name":"DB","value":4},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"6, Ranged Blast 3"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Steady Performance"}],"description":"Twister Flinches the target on 18+. Small or Medium targets in the central square of the blast are not hit. Any Pok\u00e9mon Airborne as a result of Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop above the Blast are hit, ignoring range, and Twister has a Damage Base of 8 against those targets instead.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.355"}}

Water Pledge.embed: {"title":"Water Pledge","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Water"},{"name":"DB","value":8},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target, Pledge"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Safe Option"}],"description":"If an ally uses Fire Pledge or Grass Pledge, you may use Water Pledge as Priority (Advanced) immediately after their turn to target the same foe. If used in conjunction with Fire Pledge, a Rainbow is created that lasts for 5 rounds. If used in conjunction with Grass Pledge, the target and all foes adjacent to the target are slowed and have their Speed reduced by 2 Combat Stages. Consult the Pledge keyword for additional details.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.434"}}

Wide Guard.embed: {"title":"Wide Guard","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Rock"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 1, Interrupt, Shield, Trigger"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Tough - Inversed Appeal"}],"description":"If an Ally adjacent to Wide Guard\u2019s user is hit by a Move, you may use Wide Guard as an Interrupt. All targets adjacent to Wide Guard\u2019s user, including the user, are instead not hit by the triggering Move and do not suffer any of its effects.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.428"}}

Zap Cannon.embed: {"title":"Zap Cannon","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Electric"},{"name":"DB","value":12},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":9},{"name":"Range","value":"12, 1 Target"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cool - Incentives"}],"description":"Zap Cannon Paralyzes the target. Zap Cannon ignores the target's Evasion if their are no other combatants or Rough or Blocking Terrain within 2 meters of the target.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.359"}}

Follow Me.embed: {"title":"Follow Me","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 5, Social"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Cute - Tease"}],"description":"Until the end of the user's next turn, all Foes must target the user when using a Move that targets their opponents. This effect ends if the user is Fainted or Switched out.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.397"}}

Grass Pledge.embed: {"title":"Grass Pledge","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Grass"},{"name":"DB","value":8},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target, Pledge"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Safe Option"}],"description":"If an ally uses Fire Pledge or Water Pledge, you may use Grass Pledge as Priority (Advanced) immediately after their turn to target the same foe. If used in conjunction with Fire Pledge, Fire Hazards are created in a Burst 1 around the target. If used in conjunction with Water Pledge, the target and all foes adjacent to the the target are slowed and have their Speed reduced by 2 Combat Stages. Consult the Pledge keyword for additional details.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.381"}}

Misty Terrain.embed: {"title":"Misty Terrain","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fairy"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"Field"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Beauty - Get Ready!"}],"description":"The area becomes Misty for 5 turns, While Misty, all Pokemon and Traners standing on the ground ignore the first turn of all Status Afflictions, and Dragon-type attacks targeting or origination from a grounded Pokemon or Trainer take a -10 Penalty to Damage Rolls.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.361"}}

Synthesis.embed: {"title":"Synthesis","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Grass"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self"},{"name":"Category","value":"Status"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart - Reflective Appeal"}],"description":"The user regains Hit Points equal to half of its full Hit Point value. If it is Sunny, the user gains 2\/3 of its full Hit Point value. If it is Rainy, Sand Storming, or Hailing, the user gains 1\/4 of its full Hit Point value.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.384"}}

Natural Gift.embed: {"title":"Natural Gift","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"AC","value":"2"},{"name":"DB","value":"See Effect"},{"name":"Class","value":"Special"},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target, Berry"},{"name":"Effect","value":"Refer to the Move Keywords Berry list. Natural Gift deals damage according to the Berry list and Natural Gift\u2019s Type is also defined there. The Berry\u2019s Digestion\/Food Buff is nullified and is not used."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Cool"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Desperation"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.402"}, "image":"https://imgur.com/GTp2YZW.png"}

Hidden Power (Move).embed: {"title":"Hidden Power","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"DB","value":6},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 1"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart -  Catching Up"}],"description":"When a Pok\u00e9mon first obtains the Move Hidden Power, roll 1d20. Hidden Power\u2019s Elemental Type will be changed from Normal to Bug on a result of 1; Dark on 2; Dragon on 3; Electric on 4; Fairy on 5; Fighting on 6; Fire on 7; Flying on 8; Ghost on 9; Grass on 10; Ground on 11; Ice on 12; Normal on 13; Poison on 14; Psychic on 15; Rock on 16; Steel on 17; Water on 18; and on 19 or 20, reroll until you roll another number. This effect is permanent \u2013 if Hidden Power is forgotten and relearned, the chosen Type remains the same.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.399"}}
